summary: Website for not-for-profit organization Kattar Sanatani Yodha (Odisha)

existing_features.title: Create a homepage that introduces Kattar Sanatani Yodha (Odisha) as a non-profit organization, including a hero section with the organization name and a brief mission statement
Create an About Us section that describes the organization's purpose, values, and community impact in Odisha
Create a Programs or Services section that showcases the organization's initiatives and activities
Create a Contact Us section with a contact form for inquiries and information about how to reach the organization
Create a Get Involved or Volunteer section that explains how people can support or participate in the organization's work

Implement a cohesive visual design inspired by traditional Indian aesthetics with warm earth tones (saffron, terracotta, deep gold) and elegant typography that reflects the organization's cultural heritage and non-profit nature
Update the 'Become a Member' button in the GetInvolvedSection component to link to the external form at https://kv8n70np.forms.app/untitled-form when clicked, opening in a new tab
Replace the current logo in the Header component with the uploaded 'kattar sanatani yodha logo.jpg' image, maintaining proper sizing and responsive behavior
Replace the current background image in the HeroSection component with the uploaded 'kattar sanatani yodha logo.jpg' image, preserving the existing gradient overlay and layout structure

Update the Header component to import the logo image using Vite's asset import syntax (import logoSrc from '/assets/kattar-sanatani-yodha-logo.jpg') instead of using a string path, ensuring the image is properly bundled and resolved at runtime

Update the HeroSection component to import the background image using Vite's asset import syntax (import bgSrc from '/assets/kattar-sanatani-yodha-logo.jpg') and apply it to the background using inline styles or CSS-in-JS, preserving the existing gradient overlay and layout structure

In the GetInvolvedSection component, add a 'Become a Member' button directly attached to or positioned near the text 'Join our community of dedicated individuals working to preserve and promote Sanatana Dharma values.' The button should link to the external membership form at https://kv8n70np.forms.app/untitled-form and open in a new tab, maintaining the existing visual design language with saffron/terracotta accent colors.

Update the ContactSection component to display the email address 'omkardansana1@gmail.com' and phone number '708981360' in the contact information area, ensuring they are formatted consistently with the existing design language and layout patterns.
Replace the community service image in the AboutSection component with the uploaded 'images (1).jpg' file, maintaining the existing layout structure and responsive behavior
In the ProgramsSection component, replace the text 'Diverse initiatives dedicated to preserving tradition, spreading knowledge, and serving the community' with 'धर्मो रक्षति रक्षितः'

new_feature_requests.summary: Link 'Become a Member' button to external form at https://kv8n70np.forms.app/untitled-form
Set uploaded image as logo and background image
Add 'Become a Member' button attached to the 'Join our community...' text in Get Involved section
Add contact information: email omkardansana1@gmail.com and mobile 708981360
Change the About Us section image to the newly uploaded image
Change 'Diverse initiatives dedicated to preserving tradition, spreading knowledge, and serving the community' to 'धर्मो रक्षति रक्षितः'
